title: Question about the new HUD
body:
Which team score belongs to my team? (not sarcasm i genuinely don't know) 

my inhibiter is red (which means i have my colours set to red team is red and blue team is blue, not the option that is whichever team i am on is blue team) I'm on the red side of the map, but my minimap symbols are blue, the enemy team is red on the minimap, the score that is '16' is red but on the blue side of the map but is also on the side of the map that the allied score was on in the old HUD, while the other score which is blue (the same colour as us on the minimap) is on the red side of the map and is on the what once was the enemy side of the team scoring. 

which one is my teams score? Theres too many mixed messages...
Red. Blue. Red. Red. Blue. Blue. Blue. Red. Red
